title: VO-101 error
content:
Long story short... my ISP's AI spam filter went crazy on me. They finally fixed the problem. I can send my research notes again, but only through my ISP's web mail. But Thunderbird is still throwing a VO-101 error.

How do I reset my spam filter?

Thunderbird 115.3.3 (64-bit). Just updated to 115.10.1 (64-bit). The problem persists.

Win 10 Pro

Also... Feedback: Did a Thunderbird search and automatically clicked the first entry. (Yes... that was stupid.) Ended up at a site that wanted my credit card number. Didn't give them any personal info.
creator: mmilner1

title: Thunderbird not working since 21/12
content: Since 21/12 on my win 10 pc Thunderbird wont send or receive emails . My accounts are all gmail accounts and have been working fine for several years. I get message box as in attached screen shot. I have current Norton 360 subscription and run free Malwarebytes showing no malware etc. Have I been hacked, do I need to delete accounts and reenter them? Help please
creator: auskartdyno

title: problem deleting open email from upper right hand task bar
content: When I want to delete an open email I have always used the delete function in the upper right hand corner of the open email. Since the program did it's major update there are times when I click on delete nothing happens and I have to keep clicking on it several times for it to finally delete the email. Also, when I open Thunderbird and then try to download my messages, many times the screen goes gray and I get a message at the top of the page that says Thunderbird is not responding. I have disabled all add ons and have tried to resolve this in troubleshooting mode but still no resolution. Thunderbird just isn't the same since the major update.
creator: violet41050
